summary: POWER STEERING GOES OUT WHEN YOU STEP ON THE ACELATOR TO MERGE INTO TRAFFIC AND THE VEHICLE ATTEMPTS TO STALL TAKING OFF FROM STOP SIGN. ALSO AT 14000 MILES I WAS TOLD ALL FOUR WHEELS NEEDED ALIGNMENT AND I DID NOT ASK THEM TO CHECK ALIGNMENT. I WAS TOLD I GET 30 PLUS MPG AND HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO GET OVER 24 MPG
